body.bibl: Craig, Ryann Elizabeth. “Muslims and Syriac Confessional Concerns: An Analysis of Jacob of Edessa’s Response to Islam.” In Contested Coexistence: Insights on Arabic Christianity from Theology to Migration. Proceedings from the Summer School “Arabic Christianity: History, Culture, Language, Theology, Liturgy” (Münster, July 18–August 12, 2016), edited by Octavian Mihoc and Ryann Elizabeth Craig, 1–20. Göttinger Orientforschungen, I. Reihe: Syriaca 59. Wiesbaden: Harrassowitz Verlag, 2020.
